sect2.title: Fill with FG Color
sect2.para:
This command can be accessed from an image menubar as
Edit Fill with FG Color , or by using the keyboard shortcut
Ctrl , .

"Fill with FG Color" causes the image's selection to be filled with the solid color shown in the foreground part of the Color Area of the Toolbox. (The color is also shown to the left of the menu entry.) If some areas of the image are only partially selected (for example, as a result of feathering the selection), they are filled in proportion to their degree of selectedness.
